text: James "Jim" McCann (26 October 1944 â€“ 5 March 2015) was an Irish entertainer and folk musician. Although a solo artist for most of his career, McCann was a member of the folk group the Dubliners from 1974 until 1979. McCann's death was announced by his family on 5 March 2015. He had been battling throat cancer. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Folk musicians Category:Folk singers Category:Irish singers Category:Musicians from Dublin
title: Jim McCann (musician)
